thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Ehsan Ullah
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Ehsan Ullah

author: Ehsan Ullah
title: Ehsan Ullah
text: I used Omega's rental car during seven day trip to South Island. Their staff at both branches (Queenstown and Christchurch Airports) was very friendly and helpful. Their car drove really smooth, no issues at all. Their free pick and drop from and to the airport was quick and nice service too.
